azureLogAnalytics.query:
// Tab Ingress - Outbound
dependencies
| where type == "Azure Event Hubs" and name == "EventHubProducerClient.Send" and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| extend sentOk = success == true
| summarize MsgSent=countif(sentOk), MsgTotal=count(), LatestTimestamp = max(timestamp)

panels.title: Markets Update EH Trigger Max Duration

azureLogAnalytics.query:
// DO Ingress Fail-Safe (Inbound/Outbound)
traces
| where cloud_RoleName has "doingress-eng-engine" and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| where  message startswith "[Fail-Safe] Process delayed message"
        or message has "Update race."
| extend IsRaceCheckOps = message startswith "[Fail-Safe] Process delayed message"
| extend IsRaceUpdateOps = message has "Update race."
| extend Ops=iff(IsRaceCheckOps, "Check", "Update")
| extend MessageBody = parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.prop__body))
| extend MeetingId = iff(isempty(MessageBody), tostring(customDimensions.prop__meetingId), MessageBody.meetingId)
| extend RaceNumber = iff(isempty(MessageBody), tostring(customDimensions.prop__raceNumber), MessageBody.raceNumber)
| extend RaceIdentity = strcat(MeetingId, "-", RaceNumber)
| project timestamp, RaceIdentity, Ops
| summarize Count=dcount(RaceIdentity), LatestTimestamp = max(timestamp) by Ops
| order by Ops

// SignalR Publisher - Outbound
traces
| where message startswith "Processing" and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| extend InboundType = replace_string(tostring(customDimensions.prop__inboundMessageType), "Racing.TbsCrud.Models.", "")
| extend OutboundType = replace_string(tostring(customDimensions.prop__outboundMessageType), "Racing.SignalR.Publisher.Model.", "")
| extend TbsRaceId = replace_string(tostring(customDimensions.prop__signalRMessageTarget), "RaceSubscription_", "")
| project timestamp, InboundType, OutboundType, TbsRaceId
| summarize Count = dcount(TbsRaceId), LatestTimestamp = max(timestamp) by InboundType
| order by LatestTimestamp desc

traces
| where message startswith "Called TbsCrudEngineApi" and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| extend prop__url_ = tostring(customDimensions.prop__url)
| extend prop__apiResponse_ = tostring(customDimensions.prop__apiResponse)
| extend OperationAndResult = strcat(prop__url_, " - ", tostring(customDimensions.prop__apiResponse))
| summarize Count = count(), LatestTimestamp = max(timestamp) by OperationAndResult
| order by LatestTimestamp desc

panels.description: Traffic including live feed subscriptions and manual fetching from DO Ingress
panels.title: DO Handler - Inbound

azureLogAnalytics.query:
traces
| where message startswith "Processing" and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| extend OperationAndResult = strcat(operation_Name, " - ", tostring(customDimensions.prop__result))
| summarize Count = count(), LatestTimestamp = max(timestamp) by OperationAndResult
| order by LatestTimestamp desc

exceptions
| where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| extend errorType = replace_string(type, "Racing.DynamicOdds.Ingress.Core.Exceptions.", "")
| project timestamp, Message = errorType
| summarize Count = count(), LatestTimestamp = max(timestamp) by Message
| order by LatestTimestamp desc

traces
| where message startswith "Model Validation" and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| extend prop__type_ = tostring(customDimensions.prop__type)
| extend ErrorMessage_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.prop__validationResults))[0].ErrorMessage)
| extend OperationAndResult = strcat(prop__type_, " - ", ErrorMessage_)
| summarize Count = count(), LatestTimestamp = max(timestamp) by OperationAndResult
| order by LatestTimestamp desc
